agents.name: Autonomous Engine
agents.description: Continuous self-improving AI loop that thinks, researches, plans, executes, and reflects

agents.name: Goal Intelligence
agents.description: Learns from user, builds understanding, creates goals, re-evaluates, and proposes new goals

agents.name: Thinking Engine
agents.description: Runs every 15 minutes to analyze beliefs, generate backlog items, and update thesis

agents.name: Idle Processor
agents.description: Works on backlog items when user is idle, using Claude Code CLI

agents.name: Overnight Researcher
agents.description: Researches all 700+ tickers and macro themes from 8 PM to 4 AM

agents.name: Auto Trader
agents.description: Executes buy/sell signals based on prediction scores and trading algorithms

agents.name: Proactive Engine
agents.description: Monitors disasters, markets, and geopolitical events for proactive alerts

agents.name: Cron Manager
agents.description: Schedules and runs recurring tasks (ticker refresh, health sync, brief generation)
